attributes.10: yes==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, Gelmarr's background is the same. He's also known as "Gelmarr the Grim" and took part in the raid of Stony Shore, the assault on Winterfell and the hunt for Bran and Rickon. Alongside AggarÂ andÂ Gynir Rednose, he took part in the abduction and killing of the children whose corpses were passed off as Bran's and Rickon's. He, Gelmarr, and Gynir were secretly killed at Theon's command, to prevent them from revealing the truth about the slain children. Farlen was falsely accused by Theon of the killing and was executed.==See also==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)==References==ReflistGreyjoy navboxCategory:CharactersCategory:Season 2 CharactersCategory:Background CharactersCategory:House GreyjoyCategory:IronbornCategory:Quote neededCategory:Characters from the Iron IslandsCategory:Status: DeadCategory:Performer Unidentified

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Gelmarr's background is the same. He's also known as "Gelmarr the Grim" and took part in the raid of [[Stony Shore]], the assault on Winterfell and the hunt for Bran and Rickon. Alongside [[Aggar]]Â andÂ Gynir Rednose, he took part in the abduction and killing of the children whose corpses were passed off as Bran's and Rickon's. He, Gelmarr, and Gynir were secretly killed at Theon's command, to prevent them from revealing the truth about the slain children. [[Farlen]] was falsely accused by Theon of the killing and was executed.

'''Gelmarr''' is a background character in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He is played by an unidentified extra and debuts in "[[Valar Morghulis]]". Gelmarr is an [[ironborn]] raider and member of the ''[[Sea Bitch]]'' crew. He takes part in the [[Fall of Winterfell|seizing]] of [[Winterfell]] during the [[War of the Five Kings]].
